channel.title: Sacrifice Update, and new games in my lbrary! Help!
channel.description:
Ok, steam is being really, really weird with me. First of all, a couple of weeks ago, wheni bought episode 1, steam also gave me half life source, and half life deathmatch? As far as i know, theyre unplayable.
I ignored it, and left it there.
Now today, steam would not downloadthe sacrifice update, and i was getting totally pissed. Now in my blind fury, i double clicked half life deathmatch, and steam stopped responding for a bit, then it came back, and started doing the l4d2 update (i only have l4d2) thing is, the update is 3 gigs :l ( i think it may be dling l4d2 all over again, even though i never removed the game) well anyways, any help?

item.title: Sacrifice Update, and new games in my lbrary! Help!
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Half life source also does it on mine, like 200mb/800mb, this is because it has shared files from source content on the current half life games, such as episode 1 or 2.

Read full topic
item.source: Sacrifice Update, and new games in my lbrary! Help!

item.title: Sacrifice Update, and new games in my lbrary! Help!
item.dc:creator: Maverix26
item.description:
Ughh, thank you so much bro d:

Ive been shitting bricks XD

and ive tried downloading the games. Half life source jsut says (purchase game) and i think i might be able to dl deathmtach

Read full topic
item.source: Sacrifice Update, and new games in my lbrary! Help!

item.title: Sacrifice Update, and new games in my lbrary! Help!
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Most likely you received the extra games when purchasing EP1 as a bonus of some sort. Try installing them, they’ll probably work. And steam has been tweaking out because the servers are overloaded. The update is actually 3 gigs so you’ll just have to wait.

Read full topic

Ok, steam is being really, really weird with me.
First of all, a couple of weeks ago, wheni bought episode 1, steam also gave me half life source, and half life deathmatch? As far as i know, theyre unplayable.

I ignored it, and left it there.
